about.description:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 9+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, Vue, and TypeScript.

Worked across financial, automotive, travel, e-commerce, and education sectors, specializing in modern architectures (SSR, Microfrontends, BFF), design systems, and complex user experiences.

Currently based in Lisbon/Portugal.
